NK100(the)018:1: // chos gos rnam gsum byin brlab bla ma'i zhal las shes pa bzhugs /
NK100(the)018:2: chos gos rnam gsum byin gyis brlab pa /
NK100(the)018:3: bla ma'i zhal las shes pa ni /
NK100(the)018:5: chos gos rnam gsum byin gyis brlab pa dang /
NK100(the)018:8: mtshan mo'i chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang /
NK100(the)018:9: nyin mo'i chos gos brlab pa'o //
NK100(the)018:11: mtshan mo'i dus su rang he ru kar bsgoms la /
NK100(the)018:14: steng gos gsum po de rim pa bzhin du me las grub pa'i mi lpags kyi g.yang gzhi dang /
NK100(the)018:15: stag lpags kyi sham thabs dang /
NK100(the)018:16: glang chen gyi rko rlon gsum du byin gyis brlabs la bsgom mo //
NK100(the)018:17: nyin mo'i chos gos byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK100(the)018:18: nyin mo sh+aakya thub par bsgoms la /
NK100(the)018:19: rang gi stan dang sham thabs dang steng gos gsum
NK100(the)018:20: rim bzhin du me las grub pa'i reg bya shin
NK100(the)018:21: tu tsha ba'i gdan gding ba dang thang sham dang
NK100(the)018:23: gnyis pa chos gos rnam gsum sbyin pa ni /
NK100(the)018:24: rang dge sbyor gyi gtso bo 'di la byed na /
NK100(the)018:25: sngar bsgoms pa rnams thun bzhir bsgom zhing /
NK100(the)018:26: dmigs pa 'od zer gyi spro bsdu la yun ring du gtad de /
NK100(the)018:27: de nyid la sems zin nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin skye'o //
NK100(the)018:28: 'di nyid la gtso bo mi byed na /
NK100(the)018:29: nyin gos mtshan gos sbyin pa ni /
NK100(the)018:30: bla ma byin brlabs kyi gtum mo nas /
NK100(the)018:31: stong chen mo'i gtum mo yan chad nyi ma re la rlung re re'am /
NK100(the)018:33: bdun las mi nyung pa dmigs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
NK100(the)018:34: mtshan mo longs sku'i chos gos rnam gsum byin gyis
NK100(the)018:35: brlabs la nyal nyin mo sprul sku'i chos gos rnams
NK100(the)018:36: gsum gyis brlabs la nyin mo'i spyod lam bskyang ngo
NK100(the)018:37: // dus rgyun du nyin mtshan spel mar bsgoms nas /
NK100(the)018:38: nyin mtshan gnyis kyi chos gos ster pa ni /
